column4: Hello! Wanted to ask after trying to install all kinds of p2p share fiiles for linux on ubuntu nothing seems to work, wanted to ask if there is any Ubuntu known working app p2p file share program? :O
Hello! Wanted to ask after trying to install all kinds of p2p share fiiles for linux on ubuntu nothing seems to work, wanted to ask if there is any Ubuntu known working app p2p file share program? :O
amule, ktorrent, bittorrent-gui, mldonkey, gift and others are included in the repositories
